content.content: In order to increase transparency of the Stewards call I’m introducing you this thread which will include details of upcoming calls, agenda and notes (potentially recordings in the future). Here is the first all info from the first Gitcoin Stewards call, we will be posting similar format of posts to this thread.  Gitcoin DAO Steward Monthly #1 June Date: 7th June Time: Europe & USA timezones friendly  Agenda: Workstream Intros:  → Stewards Governance (10 minutes)  → Introduction to the steward roles / process (Yalor)  → Introduction to workstreams (10 minutes) Anti-sybil  → Jess - Intro (1 min)  → Joe - Help (0.5 min)  → Jeff - What (1 min) CALL TO ACTION: Check out the Forum Post If you’re interested to participate, get on the invite list by adding your info to this spreadsheet Public Goods  → Public goods funding  → Public goods prototyping  → Decentralizing Gitcoin Topics of Discussion:   AKITA vote proposal (Andrew) Dealing with fallout from Akita community / reaching a new cooperative state LBP proposal / implementation details for the liquidation (avsa) GR10 round structure proposal (James) Adopting Maker governance rules // formal rules for governance (Trent) Stewards choosing Stewards (graduation process) (Yalor) Multiple language support   Notes are in HackMD

Gitcoin DAO Steward Monthly #2 July Date: 5th July Time: Europe & USA timezones friendly  Agenda: Please add your topics below, we’ll be working off this Google Doc for the actual call happening this morning ( Monday 5th) @ 12pm ET / 5pm CET   docs.google.com    Gitcoin (7/5) Steward Monthly Gitcoin DAO Steward Monthly Agenda 📅 July 5th, Session #2  Workstream Updates/Asks: (5 minutes)   Stewards Governance 🏫  New event calendar for work-stream leads @ AddEvent  Anti-sybil Stream 📡 @William Xuan  CALL TO ACTION: Check out the Forum Post...      Zoom Recording Topic: Yalor Tackson’s Personal Meeting Room Start Time : Jul 5, 2021 09:00 AM Meeting Recording:   Zoom Video Communications    Video Conferencing, Web Conferencing, Webinars, Screen Sharing Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference...      Access Passcode: Dbx#yrq6
Gitcoin DAO Steward Monthly #2 July Date: 5 July  Notes Notes just been added to HackMD

I announce my candidacy for a Gitcoin Dao Delegate.  I am super involved in the FDD stream and unfortunately I lack the requirements to join the Gitcoin Steward Votes. I believe I will be a valuable member of the Gitcoin Dao voting community and I will always put the community success above my own.  Please vote for: “David Dyor/ @blazingthirdeye” , me, as a delegate, at the proper time. Contact me anytime with Qs via Discord: David (please DYOR…)#4116 Thanks all!
hey, thx for applying david! Best place to do this is here, by responding to some of the Qs there.
